name: On 'Til Dawn Mattifying Waterproof Setting Spray
about: What it is:A waterproof setting spray that gives skin an all-day matte finish..Highlighted Ingredients:- Green Tea Extract: Helps tighten pores..What Else You Need to Know:With an aerosol spray application that is light as air and non-sticky, this formula sets full beat makeup with next-level hold for up to 16 hours. Featuring texture-solving ingredients to absorb oil and help tighten pores, the spray keeps the glam locked in with a blurred, flawless matte finish.
ingredients: -Green Tea Extract: Helps tighten the look of pores..-Witch Hazel: Absorbs oil for a blurred, matte finish....Butane, Alcohol Denat., Isobutane, Diisopropyl Adipate, Magnesium Carbonate, Alcohol, Methacryloyl Ethyl Betaine/Acrylates Copolymer, Water (Aqua/Eau), Fragrance (Parfum), Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panthenol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Benzoic Acid, Limonene, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Shake well before each use, and keep eyes closed during application. .-Hold 10 to 12 inches away from face, and spray in a circular motion for even distribution on skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using the product to kickboxing, fitness class & yoga and my face was perfect after. My hair was worse than my face which never happens! Im addicted and will buy this forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got the travel size as a gift and I absolutely love it! Slightly annoyed because now I'm hooked on a 60 dollar setting spray lol. This works so well and lasts me an entire day of school, work and hanging out with friends. Your makeup will literally not budge

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: The setting spray wouldnu2019t work when I tried to use it when I just bought it and it was new. I had to shake it every min for it to work. I ended up returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: never broke me out and definitely works, it beat the school air and makes my makeup last all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After all of the glowing reviews about this setting spray I thought I'd give it a try. Unfortunately it is not for me. It makes my makeup feel incredibly dry, it doesn't absorb any 'powderyness' if you like to set or bake with powder. Half way through the day my makeup cracks in any areas that my skin moves a lot(under my nose, smile lines, under and around eyes). I haven't tried this with foundation or concealer ONLY, but could see that possibly working better, or being good in really hot, sweaty conditions. The fragrance is a lot for something that you spray on your face which is offputting, and if you open your eyes too soon after spraying it BURNS. This is a big NO for me. Waste of money. And I will forever love my UD All-Nighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 'Hairspray for your face' were my first thoughts after seeing the ad, and it really IS like using a hairspray! I started out with the mini size, loved it and then moved up to the standard size which retails at a slightly expensive $32 for 3.4 oz/143ml. This makeup setting spray keeps its promises, it really does last and then some, which is no easy feat when my skin is at its oiliest! Oil aside, even perspiration barely makes a dent on how well my makeup holds up after using this. Obviously I'm not talking major sweating events, but the amount you'd typically see after a 10 minute walk on a warm/humid day. What I don't like however is the fact that the nozzle gets clogged up and stops dispensing. And after a quick search online, it seems I'm not the first person to be experiencing this either. Unfortunately this makes the remaining product unusable, which wouldn't be such an issue if it didn't cost this much to begin with! I didn't have this issue with the mini size, nor the first full size I went through - which lasted me almost exactly a month. It might be restricted to a particular batch, or it might just be luck of the draw. Either way I'm not taking my chances. Not a repurchase for me, at least not until the issue with the nozzle is taken care of.   ~ My Top 5 Beauty must-have list ~  1. Hair Loss Treatment: u2018Divine Herbalu2019 - Hair Oil  2. Shampoo: 'Sephora Collection' - Deep Cleaning Shampoo 3. Face Mask: u2018Peter Thomas Rothu2019 u2013 Pumpkin Enzyme Mask  4. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: u2018Divine Herbalu2019 - Facial Treatment Serum 5. Face Scrub: u2018Sisley' - Botanical Gentle Buffing Cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the product is great, it's doing his job and its clearly matte. But if you want it to hold all day long at either work or school, it won't stay on more than 6hrs.  If you're looking for a similar product but cheaper, the morphe jumbo setting spray is very good and the quality/price link is awesome.

reviews.review_title: effective, maybe use primer + setting powder, too!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: currently 18 with combo/oily skin (with a particularly oily t-zone with emphasis on the forehead and nose!). PLEASE keep in mind this is a partial review, as i got this without getting a primer or a setting powder of any kind. i give this a 4/5 stars for two reasons.  1. it doesn't feel like extra weight on my face? the fine dispersion makes it feel like there's no extra layer. and if it got on my hair somehow, i didn't notice it feeling crunchy!  2. the mattifying effect, the most important part of this spray, was immediate in my use. even as i used a more dewy foundation (i use the tirtir mask fit red cushion not sold in sephora), the mattifying effect still held up! :)  again, this is only 4/5 because it gave me the effect i expected--BUT i'm not giving it a full chance since i don't have a primer and setting powder to give it a strong structure to build off of for staying power. will be writing an updated review once i have time with a primer and setting powder (both probably being one/size, but we'll see!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Lasted for 7 hours of sweat and sun!

When I got home that night my makeup looked only slightly more worn than when I left. I also have sensitive skin and am prone to break outs and dryness and did not have any issues with that. I will definitely be adding this to my daily routine.

reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador. This setting spray really makes your makeup last ALL day. I like to use a hydrating mist as a first layer and use this as a last step to lock everything in. Make sure to keep your eyes and mouth closed while spraying. It has a strong scent to it. I hold the spray above my face and let it fall down like a mist. It is like shellac for your makeup!

It does have a strong alcohol scent, and it feels tight on the face when applying. But if you need soenthing to stay, it is worth it for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible product! First of all it feels like nothing is coming out so you end up over spraying. The scent of alcohol is over-powering and since the spray is so fine you end up inhaling alcohol through your nose and mouth. It also burns my eyes and skin for a few minutes every time i put it on.  I could get past all of that if it actually did what it says it does and kept my makeup on and matte all day however my skin becomes shiny within a couple of hours and literally comes off as i dab. I just came inside and took off my sunglasses and an entire patch of makeup had been lifted by the glasses which has never happened to me in my life. Terrible product, will be returning asap!!

My only complaint is I feel like thereu2019s not that much product in the bottle.. I use it everyday to set and I have gone through a bottle in not even a month- I wouldnu2019t say I used too much either but who knows maybe I got a faulty can.

The only thing I would change is the smell, but the smell is not enough for me to hate this product. Just hold your breath and enjoy. I wouldn't recommend this setting spray for anyone with dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am giving this 5 stars even though it stinks so bad it can clear a room. The terrible floral Scent is forgiven due to how well this works. Try it. It's the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about trying this and still donu2019t love the aerosol or smell but the results speak for themselves. Iu2019ve been using the urban decay de-slick setting spray for years in conjunction with makeup foreveru2019s mattifying primer and after about 6-7 hours my face is a shiny mess. Decided to give this a try and Iu2019m still in disbelief. It improves the look of my texture and it kept me matte for over 10 hours waiting in the airport after a 6 hour flight delay. I didnu2019t think it was possible. Highly recommend for those searching for a true oil controlling setting spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best setting spray ever. The people who say otherwise are either doing something else wrong in their routine, or they received a defective bottle. My makeup literally has stayed on for over 12 hours on some occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like I have to aggressively shake this when applying or it just feels like air is hitting my face. also this does not keep your makeup on till dawn, no matter how much I apply my makeup still rubs off super easily. also leaves a nasty white film all over your face. I noticed it looked like I had baby powder one when I went out with my boyfriend and it was embarrassing lol. donu2019t recommend theres way better and for cheaper.went

reviews.review_title: A staple in my makeup routine!

reviews.review_text: Hands down the best setting spray I have ever used! Keeps my makeup locked in all day without creasing.I have tried every setting spray from high end to drug store including charlotte tilbury and urban decayand this is the best one!

reviews.review_text: If I could give it 100 stars, I would!!! Iu2019ve tried so many setting sprays and this is THE BEST! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this for the last few weeks I can say this is a staple (when itu2019s in stock smh) I have extremely oily skin and a lot of the time I have to blot all day. With this + O/S powder: I literally never blot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, I can only seem to get the mini version, the full size is always sold out! honestly it completes my makeup look bringing a vibrancy to my skin. When I get sweaty, sweat does come through but when i cool off my makeup looks completely intact, my friend commented how good my makeup still looked

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this over a month ago, and I was extremely impressed with the results. The smell was strong, and it felt like I was spraying hairspray on my face, but I was happy with the results. I opened a new box this morning, and my make-up before applying this was looking perfect. I closed my eyes, sprayed this setting spray, and when I opened my eyes, my face was WHITE. My hair was white, my eyebrows were white, and my eyelash extensions were white.   I will not be purchasing this spray ever again, because it only takes 1 time for me to learn a lesson.

reviews.review_title: Lasted through a very rough week
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used it at home (Toronto) for my everyday makeup routine and it worked so well with minimal transfer especially when compared to other setting sprayu2019s Iu2019ve tried before. I also just came back from the Caribbean where I had  attended a funeral and it kept my makeup in tact pretty well through the tears and sweat.  I have very oily skin so even though after a few hours of doing my makeup I have to dab certain parts of my face, my makeup look is able to remain in smudged.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for the past week, and the main put-off is the smell. after using it the first time, I had to double check it wasn't hairspray. if youre sensitive to scents, this will give you a headache immediately, and for me it lasted all day. also, if you get it in your hair, it will feel like youre being transported back to the 80's with how stiff and sticky your hair will be. ive been wearing it for the work day, so probably wearing makeup around 10 hours total each day, and i get as oily as i normally do (which is quite a lot). also noticed my concealer breaking up a bit weird under my eyes, but im also testing the one size pink setting powder, so whos to say which one is to blame. positives are i dont notice any transfer, and i guess it would probably work well for someone without oily skin or scent sensitivities.

reviews.review_title: Stinks, but works like a charm!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The reason I am not giving this product a full 5 stars is because of the smell. There is no denying the smell of this product. It is STRONG! It smells like a heavy duty cleaning product. I would advise you spray this in a well ventilated area.  Now, the product works as claimed! This will keep your makeup on til dawn. I sprayed this on my face before heading to the club and when I tell you I sweat so much and it didn't budge. I am shocked. I tried it again on my vacation to Jamaica and again... my face did not move! Transfer does occur, but it was very minimal.   I really hope One/Size can do something about the smell because it is really holding this product back from being a breakout star amongst their other products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is my mostest favourite. I love it as I have oily and sensitive skin. Itu2019s is perfect for my skin the makeup stays on itu2019s place. Very very very less oil I see at the end of the day which doesnu2019t bother me. Itu2019s already in my autorepplainesh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was fine, definitely worth no more than $20, and it does remove makeup not waterproof.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the matte look and this not only gives my makeup that but it also makes sure my makeup does not move even with tears

reviews.review_text: made me cough and sneeze ud83dude2d. its a lot like hairspray. also it made my skin dry, itchy and cakey. maybe donu2019t use it if u have dry skin like me. i just had to return it

reviews.review_text: Love this product! Purchased it for a wedding, my makeup lasted all day, all night, and was STILL ON THE NEXT MORNING. Worth the price! I will definitely be repurchasing. Donu2019t love the scent, but other than that itu2019s amazing!

reviews.review_text: Wouldnu2019t recommend for the reasons provided belowu2026 - Not transfer resistant.  - Does not hold make up for 16 hours as claimed. - Wouldnu2019t classify it as waterproof.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this because i saw a james charles video where he used different setting sprays and this was the best according to him. So i bought the small size to try and wow wow wow wow! i had to write a review.  How i use...I sprayed on my face before putting on any make up, then as i was applying i would pray again and again, till my final spray at the end...and when i tell you my make up stayed all day it did! my test was in 34c heat in Florida walking around Epcot and my make up did not move. I wont stray from this product as it will now be a life time one for me, so happy i found it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my new holy grail setting spray, nothing budges or transfers, sweat and waterproof !

reviews.review_title: The worst setting spray Iu2019ve ever used!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product based on the reviews Iu2019ve been seeing everywhere. What made me buy this product was the TikTok video of Patrick star going into the pool after application. The first time I used this product, my makeup instantly became blotchy and my skin started showing through the makeup. It then became chalky and under my eyes became wet to the point my concealer was ruined. Long story short, I will never purchase this product again and I am extremely disappointed by this result. This was supposed to have been my Motheru2019s Day makeup look to spend the day out with my kids, but my makeup was ruined and I was so upset I ended up staying home.
Smells very strong, burns the eyes, no transfer and super beautiful effect the first 2 hours and then the makeup moves and separates, very disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: ive been wearing makeup for years and finnaly decieded to invest in something good quality, i have oily skin, so nothing worked in the past, but this is a gamechanger! it kept my makeup in place and matte for over 12 hours, if your looking for a setting spray buy this!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sure it sets the makeup and makes it matte, but the entire name of the product does not live up to standard. My makeup transfers after a while and water easily will ruin my makeup even with this on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product does the job and it's great. it does smell like hairspray and it does burn my skin which i don't love, but it does what it's supposed to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Dark skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Now yall... when I tell you, I have SUPER OILY SKIN when just wear a lotion on my face and I'd get oily right there, it's bad. I've been searching for a setting spray that LOCKS, SETS AND CONTROLS OILS for 6+ hours... and girl... THIS. IS. IT. I love the spray mist it gives me, you spray alot it doesn't wet your face, it sets and mattifies your skin instantly. I've done a wear test and it last all day for me which is about 7 or 8 hours. on the 7th hour maybe a small touch up but I haven't touched up my make-up all day and it was shockingly smooth, blurred and matte!! I event went to the gym in this, sweated, and it looked freaking amazing after!!   I'm a huge fan of this setting spray by Patrick Starr and I'm going to be getting more even though its pricey I say it's worth it.  I'm so happy yall!!!

reviews.review_text: I wanted try try a new setting spray when my charolette tilbury one ran out, i have oily skin and wanted something with hold on my makeup. The spray is awkard to use and sometimes gets stuck held down and i have to stop the cap from spraying everywhere. It smells weird and i have to keep my eyes shut for a few seconds so it dose not sting when i open them. It keeps my makeup on well but feels like there is a film on the face afterwards. Does an OK job but will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a new HOLY GRAIL product!!!!! It has a natural matte finish that does NOT budge. You wonu2019t regret buying this. Canu2019t wait to try other products from this line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best setting spray!!!!!!! Makeup will last for hours!!! Buying again for sure!!!! Awesome purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My makeup MELTED! This has never happened to me before. I returned it immediately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This setting spray is worth the hype! I have super oily skin especially in the summer and this truly kept it at bay. Itu2019s definitely a mattifying prime as in any glowy products I used were made matt after using this spray (other than powder highlighter) so I had no more glow from any places I didnu2019t set but I honestly didnu2019t mind. This is the only setting spray Iu2019ve tried as well that didnu2019t leave any makeup mask transfer! No makeup on my mask was so crazy and cool to find! Love this would 100% recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Was super excited to try this. I have super oily skin and it tends to oxidize most makeup foundations and slip off my face. I tried this hearing good reviews but unfortunately it did not work for me. I tried multiple ways of wearing this even changing foundation underneath and skincare. Def not for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is unbelievable! I have used every setting spray you can imagine. High end or drugstore, theyu2019ve all been ok. I always end up with creased, faded, or just plain worn makeup hours later.  Not with this! Easily get 12+ hours and makeup hasnu2019t budged. Looks like it was applied and itu2019s been through full days of being outside, doing outdoor activities, lunch, dinner, and drinks!  This is absolutely worth the cost and I am buying a backup immediately. I cannot risk running out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BOMB! Your face will not budge with this spray! Iu2019ve tried so many sprays and nothing beats this. I donu2019t understand the reviews that say it did nothing, I do think those people possibly donu2019t understand makeup or use it much? If you like UD spray this is even better ! The Charlotte tilbury spray doesnu2019t compare to this either. I love it so much when I ran out I used Instacart to deliver it to me! Honestly itu2019s amazing. I donu2019t ever put up reviews but had to with this one !!!

reviews.review_title: Waste of money. Donu2019t buy. Doesnu2019t do anything.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair
reviews.review_text: To begin with, it is not waterproof; it is not mattifying; it is not sweatproof, and it doesnu2019t last any timeu2014transfers to mask. Once you put the setting spray on, your face becomes and stays glowy (but not in a good way, imagine you put olive oil mixed with foundation all over your face). It also darkens all the makeup you have on the face.   Also made defined all my pores and mini pimples.   Yesterday, I was running errands all day, and my entire face was dripping in sweat, which had never happened before utilizing this product. My makeup not only transferred to the mask but also smudged a lot.   The videos on TikTok promoting this product are very misleading; donu2019t believe them!!! Unfortunately, I trusted them and threw the packaging away and canu2019t return the product. Awful, very dissatisfied and disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely amazing. I used to watch the oil on my face and makeup get gross after hours of working and nothing has worked as well as this spray. It does kinda smell like hairspray but doesnu2019t bother me at all. When I spray my face my makeup literally does NOT move and stays on all day. No oil at all on my face. Iu2019m buying another mini size that I can take on vacation. LOVEEEEEEE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Would not repurchase, very odd consistency and leaves a white cast all over my face and doesnu2019t seem to even set my make up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Runs out of C02 to make it spray before it actually runs out of product. Waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I tried it I didnu2019t like it because I didnu2019t feel anything on my face (which is actually a good thing) but I tried it again recently and realized that the mist is just super fine. Compared to other waterproof setting sprays, this one is lighter and doesnu2019t make the face feel as tight, and it seemed to be waterproof and somewhat sweat proof because my makeup lasted all day. It does smell like hairspray, which I personally donu2019t mind, but the smell does go away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have a love/hate relationship with this setting spray. It is amazing at keeping make-up locked in place for my entire 12 hour work shift. As others have mentioned, it does smell like hair spray but it dissipates very quickly so that is a non-issue for me. The problem I have with this setting spray is, I believe the spray clogs the pores and after a week of use I now have those little under-the-skin breakouts, the ones that never come to a head but sit under the skin Although I love the hold power, I would only recommend this product for very occasional use, not as an everyday setting spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, usually I donu2019t write reviews but, when I tell u this is amazing, I have fallen asleep in my makeup and woke up 4 hours later with NO MAKEUP GONE off my face! It looked like I just did it! It is nap proof!!! Amazing stuff, even my eyebrows didnu2019t move at all!

reviews.review_title: WORTH THE HYPE! TAKE MY MONEY!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down a must have setting spray for oily skin types especially during those hot, humid and sweaty temperatures. After doing all my makeup, I sprayed my face including my eyeliner as my one lid tends to transfer and leave a minor smudge on my lid. This magic in a bottle sets makeup for hours and you do not need to touch up throughout the day. This will not leave your skin looking greasy or oily it will make you look so airbrushed!! I've used so many different types of setting sprays but this one is finally the one that I will continue to repurchase, hands down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When u tell you i RAN to the review section, ladies this is a MUST HAVE. I am so impressed, my make up stays all day with minimal shine by the end of the day. I have extremely oily skin and usually am blotting oil off my face by 10AM. I will never by another setting spray, This spray is absolute magic.

reviews.review_title: makeup lasts all night with this spray
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have literally fallen asleep with my makeup on (I know, bad move, but weu2019ve all been there!) and woken up with perfect makeup in the morning after using this setting spray.   Doesnu2019t dry out my skin, leaves a bit of a pearl finish without leaving me looking shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The scent of this product alone is enough reason to not buy it. Very heavily fragranced but smells like pure aerosol chemicals that is headache inducing. In terms of the performance, it does have a mattifying effect but also feels extremely drying. So if you have extremely oily skin and can look past the toxic smell. It might work. Just get a different setting spray tbh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t care what u guys say about this hair spray or no this is hands down the BEST setting spray I have ever used in my whole life !!!!!!!!!!!!! My makeup does not MOVE no matter what Iu2019m doing like literally think of many things a person can do daily including segyyyy time this did not budge I have 3 in stoke and will always buy this love love love love it nothing else works like this I donu2019t care whatu2019s in it I love it highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hated this setting spray, it smells and feels like youu2019re spraying hairspray onto your face and it feels so gross. Not worth the hype so please spend money on something else. NOT worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like literal hairspray, when you spray it on it feels super heavy on the skin. Gave me HORRIBLE acne, not good for sensitive and acne prone skin.  Not smudge proof

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best setting spray Iu2019ve ever used. Iu2019m super oily and my makeup runs off my face by the end of the day but not with this! 10/10 recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It smells like bad hairspray. I found it did not prevent make up from transferring to a mask even when only wearing the mask for a minute. Even when touching the face the make up ends up on your hand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels like Iu2019m spraying hairspray onto my face. I do however like the packaging and the nozzle for this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: hands down the best settings iu2019ve used ..i usually donu2019t write review , but this one iu2019ll do , and i got oily skin within 2/3 hours so iu2019m shooked!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is gonna mess up people lungs. It is soooo strong. You go through all of that to still have it transfer. That make no sense at all.  You mine as well just use hairspray. Which I wouldnu2019t but honestly this is just not good.

reviews.review_title: Best Setting Spray for OILY skin! LOVE IT!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: By far the BEST setting spray I have ever tried from Sephora! I LOVE IT! especially if you have OILY skin this is going to be a game changer. The only setting spray that wont allow my face to get oily or my makeup to smudge even when I wear face mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While this did make my make up last all day it was not fully transfer proof, still had makeup on my mask at the end of the day. I agree with other reviews a lot of the product is required, basically a hairspray for your face, also really dislike how heavily seated it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Urban Decay all-nighter setting spray for the longest time and decided to give this one a try. I'm the type to get super oily after about 2-3 hours of wearing makeup, especially in the T-zone. I work 10hr days in a fairly fast-paced environment where you have to wear a mask at all times. I decided to try out the On 'Til Dawn setting spray and I kid you not, my foundation did not budge. My makeup still looked fresh after 10hrs of wear, even under the mask. My only complaint is the nozzle is hard to work with and I do agree with other reviewers when they say you need a lot of product. So, you really have to press down as if you're working with a hair spray and try your best to not inhale it in the process.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this setting spray, my face definitely stays matte all day with this. It's one of my new fav setting sprays for sure, love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I must have gotten a defective one or something because I only used it twice and it felt nearly empty so nothing was coming out. I also found the mist was super fine so I couldnu2019t tell if it was actually working. Plus it smells very chemically.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use Urban Decay All Nighter setting spray regularly. My close second is the Mac Prep and Prime Fix+. I think I like this better than both. I did notice less transfer on a mask when using this. However, the mist is extremely fine and doesnu2019t really feel like anything so I could see the potential is using a lot then running out quickly, so I took off a star since half stars arenu2019t a thing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There was nothing incredible about this. I bought it thinking it would hold my make up in place under my mask at work, and it didnu2019t do that. I also touched my forehead and had make up on my fingers. When I applied it on my skin, I did it twice because it didnu2019t actually feel like there was anything on my skin. It did however, have a nice scent to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used so many setting sprays and this one is a keeper. It has a nice light scent and keeps everything in place all day. The most is nice and light as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I have gone through all the setting sprays that are claimed to be the best and have great reviews however my skin being super oily not 1 did anything for me. I looked like an oil slick after a couple hours after application and my makeup just wore off my skin. This stuff though! I am sooo impressed, itu2019s the only thing Iu2019ve ever used that works. My makeup doesnu2019t budge and looks as fresh as when I applied it and after all day at work have very very little shine. Just hold your breath though when applying and apply liberally

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: THE BEST - this makes my makeup look flawless and keeps my oil away! I get oily around my nose and my forehead and this spray makes my makeup last all day without the extra oil! The spray is a little tricky to use - it kind of reminds me of hairspray, and its quite different than the morphe continuous spray, but its so good! It is fragranced though so if that bothers some people, you may want to skip this. I bought the mini but I'm definitely buying the bigger size during the upcoming sephora sale! I can't get over this, I LOVE IT!
